title: About ExpNext
main_section:
About Us

Your Trusted Partner in Financial Management

ExpNext was founded with a simple mission: to provide businesses with powerful, user-friendly accounting solutions that drive growth and success.

With years of experience in financial management and software development, our team has created a comprehensive accounting platform that addresses the unique challenges faced by businesses of all sizes.

We believe that effective financial management should be accessible to everyone, which is why we've designed ExpNext to be intuitive, efficient, and adaptable to your specific needs.

Our Values

Excellence

We are committed to delivering the highest quality solutions and services to our clients.

Integrity

We operate with honesty, transparency, and ethical standards in all our business dealings.

Innovation

We continuously seek new ways to improve our solutions and meet evolving business needs.

Our Team

Meet the experts behind ExpNext

S

Somchai Jaidee

Founder & CEO

With over 15 years of experience in financial management and technology, Somchai leads our vision for the future of accounting software.

P

Pranee Suksai

Chief Financial Officer

Pranee brings extensive expertise in corporate finance and accounting practices to ensure our solutions meet real-world business needs.

T

Thana Wongchai

Chief Technology Officer

Thana oversees our technical development, ensuring that ExpNext remains at the cutting edge of accounting technology.

Join Our Team

We're always looking for talented individuals to join our growing team.
